snippet: Representative Barbara Lee, a California Democrat, writes that there is no military solution to Kabul’s problems.
abstract: Letter from Rep Barbara Lee comments on Jan 9 article about Obama administration being open to leaving no American troops in Afghanistan after 2014.
lead_paragraph: Representative Barbara Lee, a California Democrat, writes that there is no military solution to Kabul’s problems.
